channel.title: [PI] need help with a small (easy) timer

item.title: [PI] need help with a small (easy) timer
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

if (c.inWild() || c.specRestore > 0)
return;
drinkPrayerPot(itemId,10927,slot,true);
c.specRestore = 2;
c.specAmount = 10.0;
c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]);
c.sendMessage(“Your special attack has been restored.”);
break;

how would i add a simple 40 SECOND time :D?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] need help with a small (easy) timer
